trans-unit.source: Encapsulates the font properties of text.
This class cannot be inherited.
Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo> class to encapsulate the font properties of text.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo>类来封装文本的字体属性。

trans-unit.source: You can specify the font name and font size.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定的字体名称和字体大小。

trans-unit.source: You can also specify whether the style of the font is bold, italic, overlined, strikethrough, or underlined.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以指定是否为粗体的字体样式、 斜体、 上划线、 带删除线，或带下划线。

trans-unit.source: This class is commonly used in a property for a class that requires font information, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Font%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 此类通常用于属性中的类需要字体的信息，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Font%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>类。

trans-unit.source: This class does not have a public constructor.
trans-unit.target: 此类没有公共构造函数。

trans-unit.source: A new instance of the class cannot be created directly.
trans-unit.target: 不能直接创建类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to modify the properties of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo> object programmatically to specify the font properties for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何修改的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo>对象以编程方式来指定的字体属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the font is bold.
<see langword="true" /> if the font is bold; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果此字体是粗体;否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Bold%2A> property to specify or determine whether the font is bold.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Bold%2A>指定或确定此字体是否是以粗体显示的属性。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值存储在视图状态。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Bold%2A> property to programmatically specify a bold font for the text in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Bold%2A>属性以编程方式指定中的文本加粗字体<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>控件。

trans-unit.source: Resets all <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo" /> properties to the unset state and clears the view state.
<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo> properties are unset when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo> object is created.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo> 时，属性将取消设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo>创建对象。

trans-unit.source: When a property is first set, the value is added to view state.
trans-unit.target: 当首先设置一个属性时，将值添加到视图状态。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.ClearDefaults%2A> method is used to set all the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo> properties to the unset state and remove any entries in view state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.ClearDefaults%2A>方法用于设置所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo>属性设置为未设置的状态和删除任何项在视图状态。

trans-unit.source: The following properties are reset:
trans-unit.target: 以下属性被重置：

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo" /> that contains the font properties to duplicate.

Duplicates the font properties of the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo" /> into the instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo" /> class that this method is called from.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.CopyFrom%2A> method to duplicate the font properties of the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo> into the instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo> class that this method is called from.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.CopyFrom%2A>方法指定的字体属性复制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo>到的实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo>从中调用此方法的类。

trans-unit.source: All properties in the current instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo> class will be replaced by the associated property in the `f` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 中的当前实例的所有属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo>中关联的属性将替换为类`f`参数。

trans-unit.source: When a style is registered using <xref:System.Web.UI.IStyleSheet.RegisterStyle%2A>, and then copied using <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.CopyFrom%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>, only the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.CssClass%2A> property is copied to the destination, not all the individual properties.
trans-unit.target: 使用注册样式时<xref:System.Web.UI.IStyleSheet.RegisterStyle%2A>，然后将复制使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.CopyFrom%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>，则只<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.CssClass%2A>属性复制到目标，并非所有的各个属性。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, if you are using <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.CopyFrom%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> to copy font information from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> that is registered, you will not get the individual settings of the font from the style.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果你使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.CopyFrom%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>从中复制字体信息<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>注册，不会因样式得到的字体的单个设置。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.CopyFrom%2A> method to duplicate the font properties of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo> into the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Font%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.CopyFrom%2A>方法重复的字体属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo>到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Font%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the font is italic.
<see langword="true" /> if the font is italic; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果此字体是斜体;否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Italic%2A> property to specify or determine whether the font is italic.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Italic%2A>属性指定或确定此字体是否是斜体。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值存储在视图状态。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Italic%2A> property to programmatically specify an italic font for the text in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Italic%2A>属性以编程方式指定中的文本倾斜字体<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>控件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo" /> that contains the font properties to combine.

Combines the font properties of the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo" /> with the instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo" /> class that this method is called from.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.MergeWith%2A> method to combine the font properties of the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo> with the instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo> class that this method is called from.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.MergeWith%2A>方法，将指定的字体属性合并<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo>与的实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo>从中调用此方法的类。

trans-unit.source: This method joins the properties of the two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo> objects by setting each property that is not set in the current instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo> class with the value in the corresponding property of the `f` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此方法联接两个属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo>通过设置未设置的当前实例中每个属性的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo>类中的相应属性的值`f`参数。

trans-unit.source: Only properties that have not been set will be replaced.
trans-unit.target: 将替换未设置的属性。

trans-unit.source: If a property in the `f` parameter is not set, it will not replace the corresponding property in the current instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: 如果中的属性`f`参数未设置，则它将不替换中的当前实例的相应属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo>类。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.MergeWith%2A> method to combine the font properties of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo> into the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Font%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.MergeWith%2A>方法，将合并的字体属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo>到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Font%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the primary font name.
The primary font name.
trans-unit.target: 主要字体名称。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />，指示未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Name%2A> property to specify or determine the primary font name.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Name%2A>属性可指定或确定主要字体名称。

trans-unit.source: The primary font name determines the font that is used to display text in the control associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo>.
trans-unit.target: 主字体名称确定用于与关联的控件中显示文本的字体<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo>。

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Names%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Name%2A> property is automatically updated with the first item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Names%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 当你将设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Names%2A>属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Name%2A>属性会自动更新中的第一个项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Names%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Name%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Names%2A> property is automatically updated with a single element array containing the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Name%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Name%2A>属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Names%2A>属性将自动更新为包含的值的单个元素数组<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Name%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Name%2A> property to programmatically specify the font name for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Name%2A>属性以编程方式指定的字体名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>控件。

trans-unit.source: The specified font name is null.
Gets or sets an ordered array of font names.
An ordered array of font names.
trans-unit.target: 字体名称的有序的数组。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Names%2A> property to specify or determine an ordered array of font names for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Names%2A>属性指定或确定的字体名称的有序的数组<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Names%2A> property is commonly used to store a list of available font names.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Names%2A>属性通常用于存储可用的字体名称的列表。

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Names%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Name%2A> property is automatically updated with the first item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Names%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 当你将设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Names%2A>属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Name%2A>属性会自动更新中的第一个项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Names%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Name%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Names%2A> property is automatically updated with a single element array containing the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Name%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Name%2A>属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Names%2A>属性将自动更新为包含的值的单个元素数组<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Name%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: To specify the font name for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo> using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Names%2A> array, set the first element in the array to the font name you want to use.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定的字体名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo>使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Names%2A>数组、 将第一个元素设置为你想要使用的字体名称数组中。

trans-unit.source: Since the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Names%2A> property is automatically updated when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Name%2A> property is set, you need to manipulate the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Names%2A> array to rearrange the order of the items in the array instead of setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Name%2A> property directly.
trans-unit.target: 由于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Names%2A>属性将会自动更新时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Name%2A>属性设置，则需要操纵<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Names%2A>数组而不是设置数组中项的顺序重新排列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Name%2A>直接属性。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值存储在视图状态。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the font is overlined.
<see langword="true" /> if the font is overlined; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果字体是否带上划线;否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Overline%2A> property to specify or determine whether the font contains a line above the text.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Overline%2A>属性可指定或确定字体是否包含文本上面的行。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值存储在视图状态。

trans-unit.source: The font underline behavior for links generated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlAnchor> controls is affected by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Overline%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo> for the control.
trans-unit.target: 生成的链接的字体下划线行为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlAnchor>控件的设置会影响<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Overline%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo>控件。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Overline%2A> property is set, regardless of value its value, you must set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Underline%2A> property explicitly if you want the link to be underlined.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Overline%2A>属性，无论值将其值设置，则必须设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Underline%2A>属性显式如果你想要显示为带有下划线的链接。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Overline%2A> property to programmatically specify an overlined font for the text in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Overline%2A>属性以编程方式指定中的文本上划线的字体<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>控件。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Names" /> property should be persisted.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Names" /> property has changed from its default value; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.ShouldSerializeNames%2A> method to determine whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Names%2A> property has changed from its default value.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.ShouldSerializeNames%2A>方法来确定是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Names%2A>属性已从其默认值。

trans-unit.source: This method is commonly used if you are either creating a designer for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo> class or creating your own control incorporating the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: 如果你创建的设计器，通常使用此方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo>类或创建你自己的控件、 包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo>类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Names%2A> property must have at least one entry to be serialized.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Names%2A>属性必须具有至少一个条目要序列化。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font size.
A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit" /> that represents the font size.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit" />表示字体大小。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Size%2A> property to specify the size of the font.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Size%2A>属性指定的字体的大小。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值存储在视图状态。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Size%2A> property to programmatically change the size of the font for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Size%2A>属性以编程方式更改的字体的大小<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>控件。

trans-unit.source: The specified font size is negative.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the font is strikethrough.
<see langword="true" /> if the font is struck through; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果字体中间删除;否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Strikeout%2A> property to specify or determine whether the font contains a line through the text.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Strikeout%2A>属性可指定或确定字体是否包含整个文本行。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值存储在视图状态。

trans-unit.source: The font underline behavior for links generated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlAnchor> controls is affected by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Strikeout%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo> for the control.
trans-unit.target: 生成的链接的字体下划线行为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlAnchor>控件的设置会影响<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Strikeout%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo>控件。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Strikeout%2A> property is set, regardless of its value, you must set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Underline%2A> property explicitly if you want the link to be underlined.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Strikeout%2A>设置属性，而不考虑其值，则必须设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Underline%2A>属性显式如果你想要显示为带有下划线的链接。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Strikeout%2A> property to programmatically specify a strikethrough font for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Strikeout%2A>属性以编程方式指定为带删除线字体<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>控件。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that contains the font name and size for an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo" /> class.
A string that contains the font name and size for an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo" /> class.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.ToString%2A> method to create a string that contains the font name and size, separated by a comma, for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.ToString%2A>方法来创建包含字体名称和大小的字符串，以逗号的实例分隔<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo>类。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Size%2A> property is not set, only the font name is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Size%2A>未设置属性，则返回仅字体名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the font is underlined.
<see langword="true" /> if the font is underlined; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果此字体是带下划线;否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Underline%2A> property to specify or determine whether the font contains a line under the text.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Underline%2A>属性可指定或确定字体是否包含在文本下方的行。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值存储在视图状态。

trans-unit.source: The font underline behavior for links generated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlAnchor> controls is affected by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Strikeout%2A> and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Overline%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo> for the control.
trans-unit.target: 生成的链接的字体下划线行为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlAnchor>控件的设置会影响<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Strikeout%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Overline%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo>控件。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Strikeout%2A> or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Overline%2A> properties are set, regardless of their value, you must set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Underline%2A> property explicitly if you want the link to be underlined.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Strikeout%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Overline%2A>设置属性，而不考虑它们的值，则必须设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Underline%2A>属性显式如果你想要显示为带有下划线的链接。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Underline%2A> property to programmatically specify an underlined font for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Underline%2A>属性以编程方式指定带下划线的字体<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>控件。
